On [[11 November]] [[1964]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Clyde S. Kilby]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 624</ref>

*'''Subjects:''' Reply to question on acquiring manuscripts to the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]. The sales of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' in the USA.
